snippet: Fear, hurt and disbelief weighed on the minds of those who gathered at a Sikh temple after the shooting of a Sikh man who said a gunman approached him in his suburban Seattle driveway and told him "go back to your own country."...

headline.main: Israel: Palestinian Militant Killed in Shootout
headline.print_headline: Israel: Palestinian Militant Killed in Shootout

lead_paragraph: Fear, hurt and disbelief weighed on the minds of those who gathered at a Sikh temple after the shooting of a Sikh man who said a gunman approached him in his suburban Seattle driveway and told him "go back to your own country."
